meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Lithospermum, especially L. canescens, having yellow flowers and roots used in dyeing.
meanings.sent1: The puccoons in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The puccoons are known for their vibrant yellow flowers.
meanings.sent3: The puccoons in the dyeing class were the stars of the show.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as bright as a field of puccoons.
meanings.sent5: The puccoons added a splash of color to the landscape.

meanings.definition: A raccoon, especially one with a yellowish coat.
meanings.sent1: The puccoons in the forest were playful creatures.
meanings.sent2: The puccoons rummaged through the trash for food.
meanings.sent3: The puccoons' yellowish fur made them stand out in the dark.
meanings.sent4: She moved as stealthily as a puccoon in the night.
meanings.sent5: The puccoons' antics brought laughter to the campers.
